import React, {useState, useEffect} from 'react'; import {Avatar, IconButton} from '@material-ui/core'; import Table from '@mui/material/Table'; import TableBody from '@mui/material/TableBody'; import TableCell from '@mui/material/TableCell'; import TableContainer from '@mui/material/TableContainer'; import TableHead from '@mui/material/TableHead'; import TableRow from '@mui/material/TableRow'; import Paper from '@mui/material/Paper'; import axios from 'axios'; import { Link } from 'react-router-dom'; import { format } from "date-fns"; import numberFormat from '../../Util/CurrencyFormatter'; import BASE_URL from '../../Util/API'; import { useParams, useLocation } from 'react-router-dom'; import './Pages.scss'; function AccountDetails() { const {id} = useParams(); const location = useLocation(); const [user, setUser] = useState([]); useEffect(() => { // set loading to true fetchUserDetails(); console.log(location); }, []); const fetchUserDetails = ()=> { axios.get(`${BASE_URL}/loans/summary/${id}`).then((response) => { setUser(response.data.results); console.log(user) // set user details to a variable and then set loading to false }); } // const getColor = user?.loan_lists?.map((loan)=> { // if (loan.status === 'unpaid') { // return 'c-red'; // } // return 'c-green' // }) return (

{user?.occupation}

Marital Status / DOB

{user?.marital_status} / {user?.date_of_birth ? format(new Date(user?.date_of_birth), 'PP') : 'N/A'}

Loans

Open

24 Dec, 2022

Ref Loan Type duration Due Paid Balance Last Payment Released Status {user?.loan_lists?.map((loan)=> { return ( *': { borderBottom: 'unset' } }} > {loan?.ref_no} {numberFormat(loan?.amount)} {loan?.loan_type} {loan?.max_repayable_period} months {numberFormat(((loan?.interest/100)*loan.amount) + loan.amount)} 0 {numberFormat((((loan?.interest/100)*loan.amount) + loan.amount) - 0)} 0 {format(new Date(loan?.created_at), 'PP')} {loan?.status === 'unpaid' ? 'Open':'Closed'} ) })}

Customer Address

{user?.address} {user?.city}, {user?.state_of_residence}

Customer Primary Contact

{" "} {user?.phone_1} / {user?.phone_2}

Customer Email

{user?.email ? user.email:'N/A'}

State of Origin/LGA

Years to Retirement

{" "} {user?.years_to_retired} years

Personal Banking Information

Ahmed Hassan Peter({user?.banking_info?.bank})

A/C:{user?.banking_info?.account_number} BVN:{" "} N/A

User Identification /No.

No. 7 Durban Street

{location.pathname === `/app/account/${id}` && U }
) } export default AccountDetails
